strapiPost.title: Co-Working And Micro-Warehouse Facility Opening In Downtown Rogers
strapiPost.content:
Loloft, a startup set to open in Downtown Rogers on Nov 30, helps small businesses compete online by providing access to world-class warehouse facilities, elegantly designed office spaces, and logistics technologies typically only accessible to large corporations. 

  • Micro-warehousing: Loloft offers small businesses their own private micro-warehouse units ranging from 150-5,000 sq. ft. along with purpose-built solutions such as shipping receipt and unloading services, loading dock access, and daily carrier services. 
  • Co-working spaces: Additionally, companies can benefit from Loloftâ€™s co-working amenities with access to high-speed WiFi, meeting rooms, phone booths, and community engagement. 

Learn more about Loloft HERE.
